name: suksma - lackstastique

shapecode_2_g=0.000

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000

shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=dav0 = bass*time;
per_frame_2=dav1 = 100000*200;
per_frame_3=dav2 = dav1*0.9;
per_frame_4=dav3 = dav1*1.1;
per_frame_5=wave_r = wave_r +1*( 0.60*sin(dav1*dav0) + 0.40*sin(dav1*dav0) );
per_frame_6=wave_g = wave_g + 1*( 0.60*sin(dav2*dav0) + 0.40*sin(dav2*dav0) );
per_frame_7=wave_b = wave_b + 1*( 0.60*sin(dav3*dav0) + 0.40*sin(dav3*dav0) );
per_frame_8=wave_mystery = 0.5*sin(0.35*bass);
per_frame_9=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%10,0);
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom + (0.1*(1+rad+0.5*bass));
per_pixel_2=mymovement = sin(sin(1.211*time)+ 0.3*cos(0.887*time)- 0.4*sin(1.453*time));
per_pixel_3=rot = rot - 0.15*sin(mymovement-ang);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    //ret = lerp(GetBlur1(uv)*1,ret,ret);
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    if (ret.x+ret.y+ret.z < (0+((mid+bass+treb)/3)*.3)){
warp_8=`       ret.x = ret.x+.6;
warp_9=`       ret.y = ret.y+.6;
warp_10=`       ret.z = ret.z+.6;
warp_11=`       }else{
warp_12=`       ret = (ret - .005)*0.99; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_13=`    }
warp_14=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_grad = sampler_state {
comp_2=` AddressU = WRAP; 
comp_3=` AddressV = WRAP;
comp_4=`};
comp_5=`
comp_6=`sampler sampler_grad2 = sampler_state {
comp_7=` AddressU = WRAP; 
comp_8=` AddressV = WRAP;
comp_9=`};
comp_10=`
comp_11=`
comp_12=`shader_body
comp_13=`{
comp_14=`        float2x2 rot = { cos(-q2) - 0.01, sin(-q2),
comp_15=`                    -sin(-q2), cos(-q2) - 0.01
comp_16=`              };
comp_17=`
comp_18=`    float final_noise = 0;
comp_19=`
comp_20=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_grad, mul(uv-0.5,rot) + 0.5);
comp_21=`    ret += tex2D(sampler_grad2, mul(uv-0.5,rot) + 0.5);
comp_22=`
comp_23=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*1.000*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_24=`    float3 output =  tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_25=`    float3 blur =  tex2D(sampler_main, GetBlur1(uv)).xyz;
comp_26=`    
comp_27=`    ret *= cross(blur,output);
comp_28=`    ret = pow(ret,0.8);
comp_29=`    ret *= bass+mid+treb; //gamma
comp_30=`   
comp_31=`}
